pros:
This organization was one of the best experiences I've ever had working for a small non-profit team. 

The Executive Director was a positive, inspirational leader who motivated staff with weekly Monday Motivation emails and many team activities. 
All members of the team were treated as equals with all points of view valued. 
I learned so much about the charitable sector watching great leadership in action.
The biblical principal that God will bless those who bless Israel. If your a Christian this will resonate with you.
cons: There is no HR department in the Toronto office. In the comment listed from HR all they talk about is supporting the cause not the issues. Management pays lip service and does nothing to ensure that employees feel valued. The current ED is incompetent and a know it all. Does not bode well in a Christian environment.
